    • Uses of Actor in vk.actor

      Classes in vk.actor that implement Actor 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  Alligator
      A simple model of an alligator.
      class  Animal
      A class representing shared characteristics of animals.
      class  Fox
      A simple model of a fox.
      class  Grass
      Not actually an animal, but still required for the simulation
      class  Hunter
      Hunter class, hunts rabbits and foxes
      class  Rabbit
      A simple model of a rabbit.
      class  ZombieRabbit
      Zombierabbit hunts other rabbits
      Method parameters in vk.actor with type arguments of type Actor 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void ZombieRabbit.act(java.util.List<Actor> newZombieRabbits)
      This is what the zombierabbit does most of the time - it runs around.
      void Rabbit.act(java.util.List<Actor> newRabbits)
      This is what the rabbit does most of the time - it runs around.
      void Hunter.act(java.util.List<Actor> newHunter)
      This is what the hunter most of the time: it hunts for rabbits and foxes.
      void Grass.act(java.util.List<Actor> newGrass)
      The grass is basically standing still and spreading.
      void Fox.act(java.util.List<Actor> newFoxes)
      This is what the fox does most of the time: it hunts for rabbits.
      abstract void Animal.act(java.util.List<Actor> newAnimals)
      Make this animal act - that is: make it do whatever it wants/needs to do.
      void Alligator.act(java.util.List<Actor> newAlligators)
      This is what the alligator does most of the time - it runs around.
      void Actor.act(java.util.List<Actor> newactors)
      Let the Actor act out what he does
      private void Rabbit.giveBirth(java.util.List<Actor> newRabbits)
      Check whether or not this rabbit is to give birth at this step.
      private void Hunter.giveBirth(java.util.List<Actor> newHunter)
      Check whether or not this fox is to give birth at this step.
      private void Grass.giveBirth(java.util.List<Actor> newGrass)
      The Grass spreads every turn
      private void Fox.giveBirth(java.util.List<Actor> newFoxes)
      Check whether or not this fox is to give birth at this step.
      private void Alligator.giveBirth(java.util.List<Actor> newAlligators)
      Check whether or not this alligator is to give birth at this step.
      private void Rabbit.infectionChance(java.util.List<Actor> newRabbits)
      This method gives the rabbit a chance to get sick and turn into a zombie rabbit
      private boolean ZombieRabbit.infectRabbit(Location location, java.util.List<Actor> newZombieRabbits)
      This method looks for rabbits to infect and spawns new zombierabbits at their position
